fixes.name: [Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs] / TOTAL([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs])
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator = SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs])
VAR Denominator = CALCULATE(
    SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs]),
    ALL('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)')
)
RETURN DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau table calculation TOTAL(...) to a DAX measure by computing the numerator as SUM(...) and the total (denominator) as CALCULATE(SUM(...), ALL(Table)). All field references were transformed to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses a table calculation (TOTAL) / aggregations, which requires evaluation across rows/partitions, so it must be created as a measure.
